item.description:
﻿Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup Series!

This event is open to all, especially to those who hate Monday's and especially for those who want to check out a different restaurant and bar scenes in and around Providence.

This week's location is Doherty's East Avenue Irish Pub ... voted recently as the #1 choice is the Best of Providence for 2011 as the best bar and beer selection by the readers of The Phoenix.

﻿﻿http://providence.thephoenix.com/thebest/providence/2011/food/barbeerselection/

In addition there will be 25 cent wings and a brewery promotion.

﻿http://dohertys.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Benjamin is hosting this week ... see profile picture for details.
item.why: There's a lot of beer selection to choose from!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Doherty's
